name: HIPAA Security Rule
description: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act security requirements

deliverables.title: Access Control - Unique User Identification (164.312(a)(2)(i))
deliverables.description: Verify unique user identification for PHI systems
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%user identification%'

deliverables.title: Access Control - Emergency Access (164.312(a)(2)(ii))
deliverables.description: Test emergency access procedures for PHI systems

deliverables.title: Audit Controls (164.312(b))
deliverables.description: Verify audit logging of PHI access and modifications

deliverables.title: Integrity - Encryption (164.312(e)(2)(ii))
deliverables.description: Test encryption of PHI in transit
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE (title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%') AND severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: Person or Entity Authentication (164.312(d))
deliverables.description: Test authentication mechanisms for PHI system access
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%MFA%'

deliverables.title: Physical Safeguards - Facility Access (164.310(a)(1))
deliverables.description: Document and test physical access controls to facilities with PHI systems

deliverables.title: Administrative Safeguards - Risk Analysis (164.308(a)(1)(ii)(A))
deliverables.description: Identify vulnerabilities and threats to PHI confidentiality, integrity, availability
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: Administrative Safeguards - Incident Response (164.308(a)(6))
deliverables.description: Test incident response procedures for PHI breaches
